name: Slow Cooker Salsa Tacos
description: Make these tonight or assemble, toss in your slow cooker, and come home to a delicious meal. Take the night off cooking—you deserve it.
preparation: Combine chicken, broth, salsa, and seasoning in a slow cooker and stir gently.
Cover; cook for 3 hours on high or 8 hours on low setting.
With two forks, pull chicken to shred. Stir to combine.
Divide shredded chicken, mixed greens, cheddar, and guacamole between tortillas to serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!
